Places like Oceanwalk, the Hilton, and others that were closer were astronomically priced, or didn't even have microwaves or fridges, less alone full kitchens. The restaurant on premises called Tailgaters was fantastic, and the prices were reasonable for a resort area. They gave you more than enough to eat, and the food was superb! I particularly liked this complex because it wasn't on the drive-on area of the beach. Although the parade of autos and other vehicles are only traveling at 5 mph, I fear for small children there on the beach. I don't have one single complaint about the complex, and I think some of these reviews are greatly exaggerated. The place is great, and I certainly would return!

Reviews.Title: “Stayed for 3 months”
Reviews.Author: huggypa
Reviews.Content: Having relocated to Daytona from Jacksonville, I needed a place to call home for a period of time. I made reservations at a hotel, I will not mention, only to not check in due to the rooms. I remembered staying here one weekend, so this is where I went again, spur of the moment. The hotel staff is excellent. They are nothing but accomidating. They make you feel like your at home. In my stay I experienced 4 rooms, (due to other reservations). All of the rooms could not be better in my opinion and they all have their own personality. They are clean and well supplied with everything you need to live an everyday life away from home. Anything that I asked for that wasn't standard in a room I received, ie: iron. It is convienently located to anywhere you want to go to in the Daytona area. There are 2 privately owned restaurants attached to the hotel that are very accomidating. One is a sports bar and the other an outside and inside Cafe. The owners are wonderful and the food is excellent. Most of the time, I ate at one of the two for three months straight. There are many other restaurants convienantly located near by so that something is available for everyone.

Reviews.Title: “The reviews scared me”
Reviews.Author: hapyday
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel the day before I found Tripadvisor and was afraid I would arrive in Daytona and have to find another hotel. The Daytona Inn is really very okay. Seems every hotel in Daytona is about 40 years old except for the Hilton. Our room was clean, no signs of any little creatures. The grounds were well kept and the pool area was clean and pretty. I know they clean the pool because I watched a quy clean it on Thursday. I broke the stopper on the bathtub and maint. was there to fix it within 15 mins. Daytona as a whole as become much grungier than in years past. Seems to be a number of homeless people hanging around, but security at the hotel seemed to be on top of letting them be around the hotel area. My 26 yr old son was sitting at the pool about 2 in the morning and said sercurity grilled him about who he was. GOOD JOB. If you need fancy to be happy, stay at the Hilton(but they seemed to have the bums too) but if you just want a fun time the Dayton Inn Beach Resort is just fine. P.S. we never once had a problem parking

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: sc355
Reviews.Content: After a long journey from the UK its was good to arrive to a freindly welcome from the staff at the hotel. Our visit to the states was great and made even better by the service and location of the hotel. Looking foward to our next visit (already booked). Would definitely recomend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Awful place, ruined my vacation”
Reviews.Author: John1963
Reviews.Content: The other negative reviews say it all. Wish i took my camera, these people posting 5 star reviews must be talking about another "hotel".

Reviews.Title: “Good value, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I am concerned about the reviews that I have read about the Daytona Inn Beach Resort. My experiences there have been only positive, We stay there every year and the rooms have always been clean and the staff has always been polite and helpful. I can't imagine any problem that could arise that would not be solved immediately. The Manager, who is always on premises, (at least seems to be) is cordial, helpful and friendly. She helped us a few times when we wanted to play some golf and wanted to do some sightseeing. The Daytona Inn is also within walking distance from many attractions including the Bandshell, Movie Theaters, Boutique shopping etc. We walk along the beach to these places since there is a no driving beach in front of the hotel It is so easy to get to. This is the first hotel you come to as you travel from the airport and turn onto A!A. And most important is the price. I never have felt that the prices are high and that is why we always stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Omg Loved It!!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: OMG!!!!!!It was so amazing!! It was like a mini beach house!!We had a pool/oceanview!!It was so amazing!!Want to come back everytime I go to the beach!!!You could just leave the hotel walk through this little thing and your at the beach!!!Many shops around and food places!!!Great experience!!!!Would recommend it to anyone!!!It isin't expensive either and there is a little restraunt too!!!!!!Best place ever!!!!Had no problems what so ever!!!Everything was perfect!!Nothing NASTY or DISGUSTING not a thing wrong with this hotel!!! L O V E T H I S P L A C E!!!!!!!!Anybody who is looking to have an awesome time at the beach you should stay here!!Very convient!!!This is no lie you should stay here best place ever!!!!!Stay here and have a good time and leave good reviews!!!Awesome place!! Will stay at again when I do come!!!!LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “nice property, great location and very nice staff”
Reviews.Author: kdcjsc
Reviews.Content: I just saw the horrible review on Daytona Inn and I had write. My family and I stayed at the hotel in April when my daughter had a cheerleading competition. We stay in an oceanfront suite which had--two t.v.'s, full kitchen, sofa bed---which was great with kids. I know that everyone has different opinions on hotels but for the money we paid and the convenience for my family I thought it was terrific! I didn't see any trash around the building and all the help was in uniform and very friendly to us. I didn't pay Hilton prices and didn't expect the Hilton. Thanks to the staff--we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experiance”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Very clean rooms, the staff was great always asking if everything is ok and the view is amazing! The security that they have also is first rate it helps knowing that they are always watching out for thier guests safety. Overall this is one of the best hotel experiances that i have had in daytona. I would reccomend this hotel to anyone who wants a beautiful room and a great guest experiance. Will be back next year!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “worst hotel experience ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: amber147
Reviews.Content: the photos on their website are not real!! i dont know when they took them i guess when it was first built. but they are very misleading. i would never stay here again. i would have rather slept in my car. our beds were very uncomfortable and the floors were very dirty. you had to wear your shoes at all times. the air conditioning did not work and we notified the front desk of this twice during our stay and nothing was done about it even though they promised it would be. also the pool was very dirty!! i was also promised this would be cleaned out and it was never done either. the toilet broke and they didnt even leave toilet paper in their. you had to call housekeeping and ask for that. there is no air vent in the bathroom and the t.v was terrible you couldnt even watch it for the horrible blurriness. there were bugs all over the walls and moths everywhere. the couch in the room was soaked and you couldnt sit or put anything on it. i would never recommend this hotel to anyone and i would never stay here again. it was horrible and needs to be shut down. even the bathrooms in the hotel lobby dont have air vents.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty Hole in the Wall”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: During my stay at the Daytona Inn Beach Resort I experienced horrible conditions. The room had dirty towels left in it upon arrival. Handles were missing off the doors to the closet. Also the ceiling leaked from the restroom in the room above. Housekeeping would often take our towels and not give them back for several hours. Often they would knock on the door earlier than 9AM. I do not reccomend the Daytona Inn Beach Resort to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Wow - what a beautiful "on the Beach" accommodation and service”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We just wanted to share our experience with a great vacation for a much needed rest on the beach! The Daytona Inn Beach Resort is right on the beach in the heart of Daytona. Outside your door is lots of sun, sand and water. Out your 'front' door is the main Daytona Beach location - rides for adults and kids, restaurants and shops. The Speedway is near by if the race is on. This is truly in the heart of Daytona Beach. The room has all the facilities - a kitchen for essentials you need - coffee maker, fridge and stove for light meals. The bed was very comfortable - just like home, the couch and chair were convenient for TV (can't miss the sports) and most important the outdoor area provided comfortable lounges. The large pool was clean and inviting. We spent most of the time relaxing and enjoying the beach and ocean. And to round it all off, the staff was very friendly and helpful and the service was exceptional. So, if you are looking for a wonderful beach location where there is unspoiled sandy beach, convenient affordable accommodation and excellent service - this is it. We would highly recommend this hotel and look forward to a return visit.

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: pinkypoo
Reviews.Content: Where to begin!!!! Undoubtably this resort is the poorest place we have ever spent a vacation at. The room was horrid, the floor was filthy dirty--never been swept or mopped! You walked across it from the moment we arrived and your feet where black with dirt! HAD to wear shoes at all times.(even directly from the shower). The TV romote was broken-we reported this but was NEVER fixed. The doors where hard to open & close-had to slam your body against them to close them. The beds where poor quality cheap foam and very uncomfortable. The tub & sink drains where SLOW, had to stop my shower and wait til it drained before I could finish it EVERYDAY. The toilet would lean forward everytime one would sit on it! We also killed 2 roaches!!!!!!! The air conditioner was so old it sounded like a train blarring when it kicked on, couldnt use it at night. THIS PLACE NEEDS A GOOD SCRUBBING TOP TO BOTTOM! The closet floor had water in it at all times, made out luggage WET. The balcony had only one chair. The pool stayed dirty, others complained of this too! I have never experienced a hotel like this one before, hopefully I wont ever again. I cannot believe the photos or messages on their site are real,...UNLESS we are the ONLY patrons to receive a terrible room like ours. (Looks like alot of people have the same resonse to this place as I do)The last straw where the roaches! That did if for us, totally disgusted with it all. MAYBE they will actually take note of these problems for your future patrons, I SURELY HOPE SO!!!!!! The Manager needs to really make sure things are getting done as they should, this place was truely a disapointment and totally different from the photos and guestbook messages listed on this site. Felt like we needed a hot bubble bath after being in this place, it was so dirty! The bar next door was loud, bums asked us for money, it smelled of beer around the hotel. No one at the front desk could care less about anything. It would be my recommendation that some really good repairs be done to the rooms, scrubbing them would be GREAT, and call an exterminator! So sad to advertise one thing and give your paying guests this type of service. I would have rather slept in the car than sleep in this so called "resort" again! Ive seen much cleaner dog pounds than this place! SERIOUSLY! I think the health department needs to make avisit there SOON! Dont believe the decent reviews I dont know where they stayed but it wasnt here at the DAYTONA INN BEACH RESORT.......what a total nightmare! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Reviews.Title: “Our Home Away from Home!”
Reviews.Author: Sandyj55
Reviews.Content: I just spent Jan, Feb and the first week of March at the Daytona Inn with a tour group from Illinois. I loved the idea of having a seperate bedroom from my living room and a couch to sit down on in the evenings to watch TV. The ocean was right outside our back door along with the Pier, the Ocean Walk and many restaurants. It was so convienent for my guests to be able to walk to many different restaurants and the trolley stop was right in front of the hotel. But the most important thing about our stay at the Daytona Inn was the staff. Carene in group sales bent over backwards to honor my guests requests and Jeri at the front desk that had to put up with me day and night!! Joy in housekeeping and Raymond in maintance were always right there when you needed them. But my heart felt thans goes out to Carol, the General Manager of the hotel. Not only did she do her best to make 80 people happy all the time but did special little things for us that went above and beyond the call of duty. She even threw us a party one night with refreshments and entertainment. From the bottom of my heart I want to thank the entire staff at Daytona Inn for a wonderful two months and I can't wait till next year to see you again!!! Thanks from all of us at Hansen Tours...Sandy

HotelInfo.Name: Daytona Inn Beach Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 219 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
